problem: 如图,在平行四边形ABCD中,∠ABD=50°,AF⊥BC于F,AF交BD于E,点O是DE的中点,连接OA,若DE=2AB,则∠ADB的大小是()
answer: 解:∵在平行四边形ABCD中,AF⊥BC,∴AF⊥AD,∴∠EAD=90°,∵点O是DE的中点,∴OA=OE=OD=\frac{1}{2}DE,∴∠OAD=∠ADB,∵DE=2AB,∴OA=AB,∴∠AOB=∠ABD=50°,∵∠OAD+∠ADB=∠AOB=50°,∴∠ADB=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB=25°．故选:B．
comment: 此题考查了平行四边形的性质、等腰三角形的判定与性质以及直角三角形斜边的中线的性质．利用直角三角形斜边中线的性质证得OA=OE=OD=AB是关键．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, ∠ABD = N_0, AF ⊥ BC to F, AF crosses BD to E, point O is the midpoint of DE, connecting OA, if DE = 2 AB, then the size of ∠ADB is ( )
